title: Adult Nappy Bags - 200 Pack, 20% Thicker Sacks, Easy Tie Handles, Odour Free, Discreet Black Plastic, Strong Sanitary Disposal Bag
features: STRONGER: Our high-quality nappy bags are made from premium polyethylene plastic, which is 20% thicker than normal bags. With a 20mu thickness, they provide exceptional strength and durability. These strong nappy sacks are unscented and odour free.

SIZE: 8 x 13 x 18 inches. They can comfortably fit up to 2 adult nappies. With a height of 18 inches (45cm), a width of 8 inches (20cm), and a width with side gussets of 13 inches (33cm), providing ample space for convenient nappy disposal.

DISCREET AND SECURE: The black and completely opaque material of our nappy sacks provides complete discretion when disposing of incontinence pads or stoma waste. You can trust that your privacy is protected with these sanitary disposal bags.

LONG HANDLES: Our adult sacks feature convenient 4.5-inch handles, making it easy to tie and carry to the bin. Whether you're at home, on the move, outdoors, or traveling, these bags provide a secure and hygienic solution for incontinence disposal.

200 PACK: Convenient 200 pack of incontinence disposal bags, ensuring you have an ample supply for your needs. With these black sacks, you can discreetly and hygienically dispose of incontinence pads or stoma waste.

200 PACK: Our product comes in a convenient and economical 200 pack of incontinence disposal bags, ensuring you have an ample supply for your needs. With these black nappy sacks, you can discreetly and hygienically dispose of incontinence pads or stoma waste.
